RelatedSentence: Malteser International will support its local partners in Bosnia Herzegovina - the Embassy of the Order of Malta in the country and its network of Catholic churches - with a donation of $ 34,000 ( 25,000 Euros ) for humanitarian relief to those most affected by the floods .
